overview: Charles is a highly experienced and well regarded senior executive. He co-founded Rosslyn Analytics Ltd. and Ockham Capital Ltd. and, prior to this was an Executive Director of the asset management division of Panmure Gordon, managing Â£1.3bn globally. He has extensive experience of working with fast growing companies and the capital markets, whilst also currently sitting on the board of the highly successful SeaDragon Offshore Ltd, where he is responsible for corporate governance. Charles served with the British Army during Desert Storm and holds an MBA from City University Business School, is a Fellow of the Securities Institute and is an Accredited Associate of the Institute for Independent Business.
